mapper.select: SELECT cc.common_code_val, c.cntnt_id, c.cntnt_title, c.cntnt_url, c.cntnt_regist_date, c.cntnt_update_date, cc.common_code_val FROM tb_cntnt c JOIN tb_common_code cc ON c.cntnt_cate_code = cc.common_code WHERE c.cntnt_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR c.cntnt_kwrd LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR cc.common_code_val LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
